item.title: Oliveaye add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Oliveaye add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "Books are the plane, and the train, and the road. They are the destination, and the journey. They are home." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Oliveaye add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "A book, too, can be a star, a living fire to lighten the darkness, leading out into the expanding universe." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Oliveaye add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Oliveaye add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Oliveaye add a quote by Jalal Ad-Din Rumi
item.description: "Knock, And He'll open the door Vanish, And He'll make you shine like the sun Fall, And He'll raise you to the heavens Become nothing, And He'll turn you into everything." -- Jalal Ad-Din Rumi

item.title: Oliveaye add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Oliveaye add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus
